alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:53PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lewis and Clark and southwestern Teton Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 853 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Augusta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Nilan Reservoir and Pishkun Reservoir. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 38 and 49, and between mile markers 52 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central and west central Montana.
